value.content:
The time interval within which declarativeNetRequest.MAX_GETMATCHEDRULES_CALLS_PER_INTERVAL declarativeNetRequest.getMatchedRules calls can be made, specified in minutes. Additional calls fail immediately and result in a promise rejection. Calls associated with a user gesture are exempt from the quota.

Its value is 10.

{{WebExtExamples("h2")}}

doc.summary: The time interval within which declarativeNetRequest.MAX_GETMATCHEDRULES_CALLS_PER_INTERVAL declarativeNetRequest.getMatchedRules calls can be made, specified in minutes. Additional calls fail immediately and result in a promise rejection. Calls associated with a user gesture are exempt from the quota.
